name: Don't Notice Me! [DEMO]
description:
Miyo is the vice president of the literature club and finds herself with the dilemma of getting a new club member or they'll shut down. It doesn't help she's got a ghost haunting her too!

Things go surprisingly well when she makes a wish with a haunted hair clip and the club turns up some new members. A few of them seem to have even take an interest in her, almost alarmingly so...

Will Miyo find out what's exactly going on or will something get in the way?

* FEATURES *

  • Cute peeps
  • Spoopy ghost scenes oooooo
  • Original BGs
  • So many CGs *shudders*
  • the amount of sprites in here are killing me and they're not even that complicated pfpfpf
  • Two endings(more to come in the final release of the game)

* This game contains themes and imagery some may find disturbing  *

* Viewer discretion is advised! *
